product_highlights: UV sterilization cabinets for heat-sensitive items
Bead sterilizers for small instrument sterilization
key_benefits: Perfect for startups and small manufacturers
Compact footprint ideal for limited space
Ideal for QC labs and R&D facilities
notes: BENCHMARK Scientific offers affordable, reliable sterilization equipment perfect for small cosmetic manufacturers, startups, QC labs, and R&D facilities. Their BioClave™ line of benchtop autoclaves provides professional-grade sterilization at budget-friendly prices ($2,000-$7,000), making them accessible to small-scale operations. The compact designs fit easily into space-limited facilities, and the simple controls make operation straightforward even for staff with minimal training. BENCHMARK also offers UV sterilization cabinets as an affordable alternative for surface sterilization and heat-sensitive materials.
